wiki.content:
'Talk' is the third single of Coldplay's 2005 album X&Y. It contains a melody by Kraftwerk's 1981 song 'Computer Love'.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: 'Talk' is the third single of Coldplay's 2005 album X&Y. It contains a melody by Kraftwerk's 1981 song 'Computer Love'.

track.name: Talk
comments: coldplay didn't rip off kraftwerk, they sampled them, with full permission and full composer credits for the song in the album liner notes. this has been common knowledge for years. get with the times
kraftwerk rip off. approved or not, that's lame. original one is much better.
the lyrics are so <3
One of Coldplays best!
Yep, I just learned about the Kraftwerk melody as well.

So I came here to say that this song, though enjoyable enough, sounds a lot like any shoegaze band, circa 1989, and now I learn that the guitar part was borrowed from, of all people, Kraftwerk. Oh, dear. This does not make Chris Martin and Co. look good, does it?
not bad for coldplay.
I FIND IT IN A LONG TIME!

...I can't believe it's true...I'm so scared about the future & I wanna talk to you...

Oh how you are missed & loved my little Vinny <3
I can relate to this song in so many levels, it's not even funny.
Yep, this is Computer Liebe by Kraftwerk. But they've got the approval to use the melody.
freaking love this track, one of my favorites off of X&Y although it's so hard to pick a real favorite from it
the chorus is brilliant
my favourite song by Kraftwerk! haha)))
dat kraftwerk

I'm so scared about the future and I want to talk to you...
I miss you so, dear Vinny...<3
This is my ringtone for so many years!
Never knew about the Kraftwerk link. Just heard Computer Love on the radio and thought 'Coldplay!' Nice homage...
good song off the album

its comin up its comin up its comin up its comin up its comin up

its DARE
